item.description: President Trump not only exposed the free trade fantasy as a farce, but rewrote the rules for decades to come.

item.title: Courts Use New Amendment To Create The Least Regulated Abortion Environment In Missouri History
item.description: Common sense safety standards and regulations for abortion facilities have been abandoned, putting women at risk.

item.title: IndyCar Bucks The System Of Endless Sports Streaming With Single Broadcast Option
item.description: Unlike most other sports leagues, which have sliced and diced their licensing rights to maximize revenue, IndyCar has done the opposite.

item.title: Complaint Accuses Far-Left WI Supreme Court Candidate Of Crossing Ethics Line
item.description: Judge Susan Crawford was on a Democrat 'donor advisory briefing' call and was billed as the left's hope to help take back the House.

item.title: Meet The Grassroots Group Fighting To Bring Voter ID To Maine Elections
item.description: This is about 'ensuring and strengthening future elections,' Dinner Table PAC Co-Founder Alex Titcomb told The Federalist.
